g-delete-message:
Are you sure you want to delete the badge "$1"?
This will also delete it from users who may have received it.
g-error-do-not-own: You do not own this badge.
g-error-message-blocked: You are currently blocked and cannot give badges
g-error-message-invalid-link: The link you have entered is invalid.
g-error-message-login: You must log-in to give badges
g-error-message-no-user: The user you are trying to view does not exist.
g-error-message-to-yourself: You cannot give a badge to yourself.
g-error-title: Woops, you took a wrong turn!
g-file-instructions: Your image must be a jpeg, png or gif (no animated gifs), and must be less than 100kb in size.
g-give-all:
Want to give $1 a badge?
Just click one of the badges below and click "Send badge".
It is that easy.
g-give-enter-friend-title: If you know the name of the user, type it in below
g-given: This badge has been given out $1 {{PLURAL:$1|time|times}}
g-give-list-friends-title: Select from your list of friends
g-give-no-user-message: Badges and awards are a great way to acknowledge your friends!
g-give-no-user-title: Who would you like to give a badge to?
g-give-to-user-message: Want to give $1 a different badge?
g-imagesbelow: Below are your images that will be used on the site
g-remove-message: Are you sure you want to remove the badge "$1"?
g-recent-recipients: Other recent recipients of this badge
g-remove-success-title: You have successfully removed the badge "$1"
g-sent-title: You have sent a badge to $1
g-sent-message: You have sent the following badge to $1.
gift_received_subject: $1 has sent you the $2 badge on {{SITENAME}}!
gift_received_body:
Hi $1.

$2 just sent you the $3 badge on {{SITENAME}}.

Want to read the note $2 left you and see your badge? Click the link below:

$4

We hope you like it!

Thanks,


The {{SITENAME}} team

---

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click $5
and change your settings to disable email notifications.
right-giftadmin: Create new and edit existing badges
